abilities.title: Metal Craftsmanship
abilities.description: Kobolds have a basic understanding of metalworking, equal to Field Armorer skill with a +10% bonus, plus +10% to recognize weapon quality, art (jewelry), and gemology skills, specializing in weapons and jewelry.

abilities.title: Tunneling Mastery
abilities.description: Kobolds dig and build solid tunnels with speed and dexterity, identifying natural vs. constructed tunnels and their age. Base Skill: 40% +5% per level of experience. Nightvision 400 ft (122 m), day vision 40 ft (12 m).

abilities.title: Underground Designer
abilities.description: Kobolds are excellent underground architects, building rooms, archways, and traps. They recognize construction styles and can locate/deactivate traps. Base Skill: 30% +5% per level of experience; trap detection/deactivation at half skill level.

abilities.title: Subterranean Instinct
abilities.description: Kobolds have an innate sense of direction underground, determining direction, depth, and slope, and judging surface structures in familiar areas. Base Direction Skill: 40% +5% per level; Surface Structure Skill: 30% +5% per level (-25% in unfamiliar areas).

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 on initiative, +2 to save vs horror factor.
